Detailed Description

Bit vector used to indicate on which patch data elements to apply operations.

Class ComponentSelector implements a bit vector of a fixed length and is typically used to apply operations on subsets of entries in the patch data array owned by a patch (e.g., allocate/deallocate). All ComponentSelector objects have the same bit vector length that is established by the SAMRAIManager utility. See the documentation of the SAMRAIManager utility for information about changing this maximum value.

See also:
tbox::SAMRAIManager
